wybug_type: 系统/服务运维配置不当
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 安全无小事 详细说明：  存在DNS域传送：55tuan.com => 111.20.240.154



   漏洞证明：  
C:\Users\Administrator>nslookup默认服务器:  UnKnownAddress:  211.137.130.3> set type=ns> 55tuan.com服务器:  UnKnownAddress:  211.137.130.3DNS request timed out.    timeout was 2 seconds.非权威应答:55tuan.com      nameserver = ns2.dnsv5.com55tuan.com      nameserver = ns1.dnsv5.comns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 117.135.170.109ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 115.236.151.190ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 221.204.186.11ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 183.60.57.191ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 180.153.10.191ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 119.28.48.211ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 183.60.59.218ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 122.225.217.194ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 125.39.213.166ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 180.153.162.153ns2.dnsv5.com   internet address = 184.105.206.67ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 117.135.170.109ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 180.153.10.169ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 125.39.213.190ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 183.60.59.217ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 112.90.143.36ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 115.236.151.142ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 115.236.151.180ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 182.140.167.191ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 119.28.48.224ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 183.60.57.192ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 184.105.206.63ns1.dnsv5.com   internet address = 119.167.195.9>
   修复方案：  我是来找礼物的！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-09-15 16:42 厂商回复： 这个是是我们授权的各个 IP 地址，在 additional 区域的内容，不是漏洞。这个是DNS的glue record，放在DNS应答包的additional section，为NS地址的IP。glue record用于指定NS地址的IP，需要在根上进行注册，然后递归服务器才能通过glue record中的IP地址找到授权服务器进行域名解析。 最新状态： 暂无
